name: Rubicon 2000
description:
‘One of the early Cape Bordeaux royals - now celebrating a quarter century. Regality evident in 2000’s deep, polished robe; imposing yet unintimidating vinous mélange with cedary decoration. Sleek, agreeably fresh, medium-bodied. Present tannic grip suggests no problem ‘losing’ this for another 6 years. 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Franc. 2 years in French oak, 80% new.’ - Platter’s SA Wine Guide 2005, 4.5☆*“Deep purple ink colour. A spicy tobacco leaf and cigar box bouquet. Firm tannins, youthful palate. The wine is well-balanced and has good ageing potential.”* - **Best in Class Silver - International Wine and Spirits Competition ( IWCS ) 2005**

 The wines will continue to be cellared at the Meerlust vintage cellar until maturity (estimated 2028) or withdrawal. Rubicon is not produced every year. If a vintage is not produced, the NFT will include the next vintage, to total 50 consecutive vintages
